Package service.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DirectoryParser
    util class to list all files contained in a directory can handle directories packaged in a .jar file code taken from stackoverflow: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11012819/how-can-i-get-a-resource-folder-from-inside-my-jar-file
    PreferenceManager
    saves user setting with the Preference API List of setting: libraryroot - root directory of the music library pNewScratch - probability of creation of a new scratch when simulating attrition pNewScratch - probability of creation of a new constant noise if not existing when simulation attrition dbpath - path to the directory the database should be placed incAmpAfterTimesPlayed - times played after the noise-amplifier should be increased degreeOfWear - specifies the degreeOfWear with a predefined or custom profile pathsSetYet - true if dbpath and libraryroot have been set (validated on startup)
    TrackManager
    ring buffer which is used to manage the order of all tracks
